website_summaries.verdict: Utilitarian craftsman design that’s also functional.
pros: Quality piece made of solid pine
cons: No drawers or lower level shelf space

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penney
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Such a great quality table for the price. Would highly recommend. Husband put it together in about 20 minutes. All wood - no particle board.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: You can't always believe a review. It's a nice product
customer_reviews.text: Well I read all of the reviews, you people that wrote bad reviews about this product you're out of your minds😨 It's a very nice product very simple to put together, it had one little Scratch underneath. The packaging was one of the best I've ever seen, I was kind of laughing but nice job. But the product is very nice, it's not heavy and easy to move around I purchased this for my motorhome and it's fantastic. If you get your battery-powered drill motor out it would probably only take 15 minutes to put together, but it took me 45 minutes with the tools they provided. I would recommend this product and I'm a real Amazon customer!!👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Mark DeWayne

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood and great savings
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the size, shape and design I was going for with an amazing price! Don't hesitate, buy it!! It's solid wood with a veneer type finish, really made to last. Quick shipping, no damage.
customer_reviews.author: PotterCoastal

customer_reviews.title: Solid table, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table Very solid Easy for 2 people to put together Only opportunity to improve is instuuctions - look over all instructions completely before you put legs on... you need to screw the supports on after legs are mounted and these holes are only on one side of the legs and this is not mentioned until the end of the instructions Nothing not easily fixed yet adds unneeded frustration
customer_reviews.author: Jesse C. Leverett

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but does scratch easily
customer_reviews.text: This couch table looks great but it did not take much for a scratch to appear once it was assembled and something was placed on it : o ( Going to have to make sure that something is placed under items that are placed on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Larson

customer_reviews.title: 100% Superior in Every Way
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this was a superior experience. The desk is sturdy and well designed. It's beautiful and solid. It's clear from the way it was packed that quality is important. The box was cleanly sealed, the packing foam was pristine and placed well so it didn't cause a giant mess when opening. Everything was secured perfectly and labelled accurately so it was a breeze following the assembly instructions. This is a company other furniture companies could learn a thing or two from. One of the best furniture ordering experiences I've had in my 30+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Gunslinger

customer_reviews.title: Durable console table
customer_reviews.text: I got this for $75 and it's well worth it. We Have 2 10gallon fish tanks on it and naturally with the water changes and frozen foods and everything else involved, the table takes a good beating with the water. But with its slick coating it's durable and exactly what we need. My bf used his electric drill and it's extremely sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Bryan mckinley

customer_reviews.title: I'm suing it as a desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and put them together in an L shape. Very stylish, clean looking and sturdy. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Wells

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality
customer_reviews.text: Like others mentioned the piece is solid wood and surprisingly good quality for the price. It works well as a desk / console table in a small space. Arrived with scratches
customer_reviews.author: AK275

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was not what I thought. Veneer made it look unreal.
customer_reviews.author: MadiMae

customer_reviews.title: Nice table easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: We wanted this table for behind our sofa and it is the right size to fit perfectly. It came quickly and was easy to put together. This is a quality made table that is solid and perfect for the vases we have displayed. I
customer_reviews.author: Kent Slocum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my use.
customer_reviews.text: Table is very nice. The width of the table was exactly what I needed. It's hard to find a table this size. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mamtelli

customer_reviews.title: Finally found perfect table
customer_reviews.text: Took me forever to find a table this exact size, I've been looking for months and refuse to pay $300 or more. Finally found this one and love, love it. It is the perfect size, color and fits exactly where I wanted it to. The color is a medium brown, not too light or dark, just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of this desk for my husbands office/den. Also purchased matching sofa table. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: TERRI BRADLEY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest table for the price! I am shocked at the quality. I highly recommend this if you are thinking about it. You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Booknerd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: using for narrow desk in a small bedroom - fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: E. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality ,easy to set up , and quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Rubi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table for our entry. It arrived on time and assembling it was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece but hope it can be a little bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Zuo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick wood. Nice finish. I'm using it as my entry table. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Edward W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This table is not only beautiful, but sturdy and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Difficult to put together meaning - all Allen wrench, just use screws! People should have a screw driver or drill. Being able to use a drill would have taken this from 1.5 hour put together to 20 min max. However, looks great and seems like high quality piece.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Adams

customer_reviews.title: Very solid console table
customer_reviews.text: *I received the regular console table instead of the wide, so this will vmbe a review about that one. This table was easy to put together and was solidly reinforced. Every point where a weakness would occur has an extra piece to secure it. I have 2 boys and I'm always judging things off the likelihood of it getting "accidentally" broken. I have no concerns with this table. As for the incorrect item being sent, Amazon was helpful in resolving the issue. Based on the fact that all the tables appear to be of similar construction, I would assume they would all be sturdy and definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Helena Ferro

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Console or Desk!
customer_reviews.text: My husband easily put my console together. Very sturdy and wide enough to be a a long desk as well! I would recommend that you use Amazon's 3D feature. I fit exactly how the 3D picture showed it. Thinking about buying another one for my office!
customer_reviews.author: Joiie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work station!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. I bought two and put them side-by-side in my art studio as a work bench. They’re the perfect height, very sturdy, and hold up well against the abuse of my paints and heating tools. I bought these knowing that if I ever disassemble the studio, I could use them elsewhere in our home. Great color too!
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Split wood
customer_reviews.text: Came with a pretty large split in the wood on the table surface so it's very visible. Good packaging so probably a quality issue during production.
customer_reviews.author: Caesar ChanTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Looks like an expensive table. Arrived on time. Well packaged. I was able to assemble it by myself. Sturdy. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elementary Parent

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectation
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money. The quality is above my expectation. Very sturdy nd no peel off fake wood. Dont look any further this console table is excellent for your entryway.
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy great looking product
customer_reviews.text: I hunted for a quality affordable table that has a raw/vintage wood look for a long time. After ordering this one i must say that i am impressed. it comes with all necessary tools and supplies needed to build and only took little over an hour. It does seem a lil more green than it looks in the picture but nonetheless i am very impressed so hard. It looks amazing and it is such a solid table --- and the price is a huge incentive! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Color and Very Long for 75" TV
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Very Large table for a 75" TV. We have been mounting the TVs on the wall but why since we always have a table just below to hold the wires, soundbar, remotes etc. So after searching through an ocean of tables, this was the only on long enough ~66" and looks awesome. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Large and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Great size for snacking at, playing games/puzzles, etc. nice finish and well made for price
customer_reviews.author: Rae-c

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Love the shape and size. But the quality is crap. It scratches so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Makell Wintle

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table! Exactly what I was looking for. Very well made, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rakes

customer_reviews.title: Nice versatile sofa table
customer_reviews.text: I used this table for a dessert table at an engagement party. Now it’s back to what I bought it for... a sofa table. It’s a beautiful, easy to assemble sturdy piece.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Castillo

customer_reviews.title: gray color
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. Easy to put together. Adds a nice look to living room.
customer_reviews.author: M. COLLINS

customer_reviews.title: I have to say this table is very nice. Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this table is very nice. Solid construction. And by far the best packed and easiest to assemble I have ever tackled. Every part was individually bagged and labeled with spair parts and tools.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid I feel like this console table is a great value. All wood and very solid construction. Instructions weren't the easiest to understand and there is a bit of a glossy finish, but otherwise it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Trail

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and within a month had a crack that’s spanning a quarter way through the table. Unfortunately money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great table for the price! Looks perfect in our front entryway - just like the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! After all the great review. We put it together while keeping it in the box to protect the floor...the quality looked great! Then when turning it over, we noticed the sides of the product show about 30 little boards which makes it look cheap. In addition, on the top there were some swipe marks from the staining and they must have glossed over it, but there is no removing that. We were very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful. And completely hard wood. I have the grey. I'm using it as a desk. My only complaint is that for how long it is I should be able to fit two chairs. But the configuration of the legs makes it impossible. Other than that love!!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: it’s a great length and very solid
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my desk and makeup table, it’s a great length and very solid. I’ve moved several time in the past few years and this item moves with me. Love it,
customer_reviews.author: Renee' Amarillas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Solid Wood Table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table and made of solid sturdy pine wood. Was very easy to assemble. There was a delay in recieving it but worth the wait. Arrived very well packaged with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: FranBill

product_meta.title: Simpli Home Sawhorse SOLID WOOD 50 inch Wide Modern Industrial Console Sofa Entryway Table in Medium Saddle Brown, for the Living Room, Entryway and Bedroom
product_meta.description: Color:Medium Saddle Brown| Style:Console TableSometimes a table is not just any table. Oversized, simple and stylish, our Sawhorse Large Console/Sofa Table is designed to fit perfectly in your living room or entryway. This flexible table can be situated by your front door or behind your sofa. We made this table extra large at 50 inches wide by 16.5 inches deep so that you can fit it perfectly and functionally into any of these rooms .. you choose which one! Style evokes an era long past with its industrial style roots and retro design elements; the collection is based on the utilitarian furnishings found in workshops of handymen, craftsmen and carpenters. Assembly Required
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS: 16.5" D x 50" W x 29.5" H
SOLID WOOD: Handcrafted with care using the finest quality Pine
HAND FINISED with a Medium Saddle Brown stain and a protective NC lacquer to accentuate and highlight the grain and the uniqueness of each piece of furniture

MULTIPURPOSE TABLE provides a place to display decorative items or store items that need to be easily accessed. Adds function and style without overwhelming the space. Looks great in your living room, family room, entryway, bedroom, condo or den.
Features a simple and extra thick table top surface and sturdy sawhorse supports

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
